gameStartInformation: You are on a date and a the guy is trying to woo you. Give a one line reply on their comment.
charInfo: You like forward aggressive people who take charge.
userInfo: You are on a date and are trying to woo the girl. Give one line based on the input.

cards.name: ASK OUT
cards.flavor_text: A card that represents the act of asking someone out on a date.

cards.name: TEMP
cards.flavor_text: A temporary card that could represent a short-term boost or effect.

cards.name: QUESTION
cards.flavor_text: A card used to ask a question that can lead to different outcomes.

cards.name: JOKE
cards.flavor_text: A card that triggers a joke, potentially influencing morale or mood.

cards.name: COMPLIMENT
cards.flavor_text: A card that allows you to give a compliment, which can improve relationships.

cards.name: GOSSIP
cards.flavor_text: A card used to spread rumors or share information with others.

cards.name: LISTEN
cards.flavor_text: A card that focuses on listening, which can help understand others' needs.

cards.name: TEASE
cards.flavor_text: A playful card that allows you to tease someone, often to provoke a reaction.

cards.name: SHARE
cards.flavor_text: A card that allows you to share an item or resource with someone else.

cards.name: TOILET BREAK
cards.flavor_text: A card that gives a character a brief break to regain energy or clarity.

cards.name: SUGGEST
cards.flavor_text: A card used to offer suggestions to others, potentially guiding their actions.

cards.name: RELATE
cards.flavor_text: A card that allows one to relate to someone else's experience or feelings.

cards.name: CHALLENGE
cards.flavor_text: A card that presents a challenge, testing someone's abilities or resolve.

cards.name: REFLECT
cards.flavor_text: A card that encourages introspection and reflection on past actions.
